item.title: ‘Madden NFL 26’: Here’s Where to Score the Game Online
item.description: Ahead of the 2025-26 season, the latest “Madden NFL” is here! The newest entry in the gaming franchise is the biggest yet with all 32 NFL teams with superstar players, including Patrick Ma
